snippet.title: Death and Betrayal in Romania: A Dana Knightstone Novel Collector's Edition
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1InRcbn
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1Dq4iHo

Play a FREE trial of this immersive, high-quality game! Then pay once & play forever offline! 

Tragedy strikes Dana Knightstone, the best-selling novelist with a gift for clairvoyance. Step into Dana’s shoes as she travels to a book signing event in Romania. An avalanche traps her in the cold mountain Alps where she gets stranded in an old castle!

• ESCAPE THE GRASP OF A LOVESTRUCK SPIRIT
You’ve been captured by the ghost of Count Lucien who has mistaken you for his lost love Alexandra!

• REUNITE A PAIR OF GHOSTLY LOVERS
Solve the mystery of a tragic love story and find out who killed Alexandria.

• EXPLORE A HAUNTED ROMANIAN CASTLE
Navigate through the empty castle and beautiful landscapes using an interactive map and search for clues and hidden objects. Rely on your instincts to solve formidable mini games and puzzles! 

• UNRAVEL A BRAND NEW GHOST STORY IN THE BONUS CHAPTER!
Collect challenging achievements along the way and enjoy replayable cutscenes, wallpapers, and concept art!

*** Discover more from Big Fish! ***

Check out our entire game library with our Big Fish Games app absolutely FREE here: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishGamesApp

Sign up for our newsletter and never miss a new release or promotion again: http://bigfi.sh/iSplashNewsletter

Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com! 

Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BigFishGames

Follow us on Twitter: http://bigfi.sh/BigFishTwitter
